ygData.subject: We're off to see the Wizard!  this aint Kansas Dorothy!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Madoc!  This is the Great and all powerful Zardoz!  Greetings.  I just landed in Freeport last night, getting off the ship by the port authority: I was so
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Madoc! This is the Great and all powerful Zardoz! Greetings. I
just landed in Freeport last night, getting off the ship by the port
authority: I was so glad to get off that boat; do you have any idea what
seasick dwarves smell like? Ugh! I'm on a quest to see the world and
find Itan so I can insult him to his dim-witted, empty-headed face,
hehe. Care to join me in my travels??? My plan was to restock
malachite in Freeport and set off for Rivervale. I believe that retard,
Itan, is somewhere to the west, perhaps as far as the land of Erud: oh
brother, another boat crossing!
So, Madoc, if you are up for it, or for that fact any other adventurous
soul, except necros, in or about Freeport, let me know and we'll get
together and set out tonight.
Itan: prepare yourself for my august presence! When we first meet I
realize my scintillating intellect will probably, since you are a lower
form of life, overwhelm you with awe! <OOC: Itan, where you hiding out?
Since I'm headed that way it would be nice to know where you are, hehe>
<ooc: personally, I think it would be really cool if we could get a band
of crazies together and roam all over Norrath; terrorizing necros and
helping folks out along the way.>
